name: zwavebus
description: The ZwaveBus application allows you to communicate with your Z-Wave devices. All the Z-Wave events received by the Raspberry Pi are transmitted to an event bus developed in NodeJS. You can quickly develop your own listeners that subscribe to specific Z-Wave events. Few lines of codes are enough to retrieve or submit some Z-Wave events.
author: Ludovic Toinel <ltoinel@free.fr> (https://github.com/ltoinel)
